title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your sixth house activates a highly competitive, problem-solving phase focused on work, health routines, and overcoming obstacles. You feel driven to defeat challenges, rivals, and inefficiencies through unconventional strategies. This placement favors tackling debts, disputes, and long-standing issues with sharp intelligence. However, stress and irregular habits can affect health if discipline is ignored. Rahu here rewards smart effort, adaptability, and persistence, turning pressure into practical victories.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong urge to prove capability through action.

sections.heading: Career
points: Service, analytics, or tech roles benefit.
Success comes from mastering complex tasks.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Conflicts surface but can be resolved decisively.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Confidence grows by solving real problems.

closing: Rahu in the 6th house turns struggle into strength. With discipline, this transit helps you conquer obstacles decisively.
